author: Francesco Masulli
title: An experimental analysis of the dependence among codeword bit errors in ECOC learning machines
window: machine, varying the number of hidden units between 5 to 50, yielding to 11#20 = 220 evaluations of I E ; I SE ; #R and # S both for ECOC monolithic and ECOC PND learning machines. For the UCI data sets glass letter and optdigits we used only 2 different structures, using, respectively, 5 and 9, 120 and 140, 60 and 70 hidden units, yielding to 2 # 20 = 40 evaluations of the mutual information
